captions.text: [MUSIC]
Call of Duty Black Ops 3, or

whatever the next Call of Duty game
will be called next year, 2015.
We are already starting to get teasers.
Which is crazy.

I'm gonna be letting you guys
know what's up, what's going on.

I know that Call of Duty: Advanced
Warfare's only come out very recently, but

of course I'm here to keep you
guys updated with everything.

So you guys know exactly what's
good when it comes to Call of Duty.

On top of that,
today I hit 5 million subscribers!

Thank you so much, guys, I plan on doing
a few special videos next weekend, so

look out for those, and, again,
big thank you, crazy, crazy milestone.
So, those of you guys who don't know,

we are now on a new three year development
cycle for the Call of Duty games.

We had Infinity Ward,
making goes last year.

We've had Search Hammer games making their
first full Call of Duty game this year

with Advanced Warfare, and next year,
it's gonna be bouncing back to Treyarch,

who developed Call of Duty Black Ops 2,
a few years ago.

So one would assume that the next
Call of Duty game will be Call

of Duty Black Ops 3, so
that's what I'm gonna refer to it as.

But at the moment we have no
guarantee in terms of its name,
its setting, or anything.

It was very much an open opportunity
as to what this game's gonna be like.

And if we head over to David Vonderhaar
from Treyarch's Twitter account,

we're already starting to get
small pieces of information.

Now, he does this leading up to games,
just tweeting out little thoughts and

little pieces about the next
game that they're developing.
And we're getting this very early on.

And funny enough it's actually
related to multi-player.

Of course with a three year cycle they're
gonna be well into the campaign and

already starting a multi player despite
the fact that the game's gonna be

coming out next November and
he tweets first of all saying dev pro tip.

When you get menu music you
love well before you ship,

basically well before you send
the game out to be bought.

Take it out immediately so
nobody burns out on it, and

he CC's one of the audio
guys from Treyarch.

Now, as soon as I saw his tweet, I knew it
was related to the next Call of Duty game,
and I was like, holy cow.

I did not expect any tweets like this so
early on.
But it didn't stop there.

He continued to tweet, saying,
Playtested Domination with no time-limit,

round switch whenever it first hits a 100,
and then you win at 200.

On top of that he said I didn't think I
would like it, but it eliminates some of

the strangeness with mathematical
elimination and the games still go fast.

For those guys who didn't know
in Call of Duty Black Ops 2,

they introduced a two sided domination and
set up which makes you switch sides.

You're playing on both sides for
domination.
Some people liked it, some people didn't.

But these guys over at Treyarch
are already well in development and

thinking about those important points that
come down in multi player that you or

I may complain about or
may think about think about a lot.

So these guys are already
thinking about Black Ops 3,
and the development is well into progress.

Which is very exciting,
I want to let you guys know.

And it also means that now that
the information has started to come out,

we can definitely expect more
little tidbits of information

coming out in the near future and
I'll keep you guys updated.

Now, In terms of what we actually
know about this next game.
Very very limited.

All that I know is that when
advanced warfare got announced

I saw a ton of community feedback from
you guys and you know it's people across

the internet that said they didn't
really want another futuristic game.

there was a huge outcry for
a world war style, call of duty so
World War 1 or World War 2.

Developed for
Next Gen with crazy graphics and

just sort of revamping an old
school classic shooter.
So maybe you guys would love to see that,

maybe an old school, old style Call of
Duty game coming from Treyarch next year.

Let me know what you guys would like to
see, and I'll be reading the comments and
you guys could discuss it with each other.

Of course, as I said we are a long way off
of actually knowing more about this game.

We probably won't know about it until
I'd say sort of March time next year.

So of course, stay tuned on here on the
channel here I'll keep you guys updated.

So there you go guys the first pieces
of Call of Duty information for

next year are trickling
through very gradually.

But of course the advance
[INAUDIBLE] will be continuing.
I loving GTA recently.

You guys are showing no
video's lows in support.

So check out the video on screen here
in case you've missed anything at all.
Hope you had a fantastic weekend.
I enjoyed myself.

But it's time to kick
off another new week.
I'll be making videos for you guys.

Hopefully you'll be enjoying yourself and
I'll see you tomorrow with another video.

title: Call of Duty Black Ops 3? - The teasing begins...
